title: krpAlaya shrI guru madhvarAya
sahitya:
krpAkara shrI guru madhvarAya nrpOttamAgraNi satya vijayapura vibhu shrI tirumala rAjapAla


anupallavi

  suparNavAha shrI sItArAma sundarapAda pUjA nirata lOka vinuta divya satya mAnasAnna bhrnga


caraNam 1    shrI hariguNa pArAyaNa caNa shObhitadara cakracinna bAhumUla pAhimAm 
shrI nandagOpa suta padAnnupanga bhakta mAnasa 
    caraNam 2    tulasI maNi hAra gaLa racitOpa niSAbdhApyAdi grantha bahuLa 
vilasita nArAyaNa mantra paThita rasana vimatadUra suguNAkara
    caraNam 3    dhrta hEmamaya kASAyambara payanAvatAra lOkOpakAra
satata sadAshiva kavi mAnasacara namAmi bhayahara dayAsAgara
